name: Wolfgang Schulz
learned: Wolfgang Schulz is the seeker with Klaus Mueller in the game of hide and seek in Smallville. He is passionate about being the seeker and wants to find all the people hiding in Smallville all costs.
currently: Wolfgang Schulz is searching for the other 8 people who are hiding in Smallville. If Wolfgang Schulz finds one of them, the game is over and eveyone will start all over again.
